cover.title:
Jose Avila
JavaScript developer 
& UX/UI designer

bio.title: How dio I Help?
bio.desc: I am a JavaScript developer and UX/UI designer based in Santiago, Chile. I have been working in the web development field for the last 5 years. I have a strong passion for creating user-friendly interfaces and I am always trying to improve my skills. I am always looking for new challenges and I am always trying to improve my skills.
bio.techs: HTML semantic, CSS, JS (vanilla), React, React native,  Angular, PHP, NodeJs, mongoDB, Mysql, firebase, AWS, github actions, Docker,  Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere

contact.title: Interested in working with me?
contact.desc: I am always open to new projects and I am always looking for new challenges. If you are interested in working with me, please contact me.
